name: manufacturing-inventory-sqlgen
description: Natural language to SQL generator for manufacturing inventory management

tools.name: generate_sql
tools.description: Convert natural language query to SQL for inventory database. Supports queries about stock levels, inventory value, supplier performance, and transaction history.

query.description: Natural language query about inventory (e.g., 'Show me parts below reorder point')

include_explanation.description: Include explanation of generated SQL logic

tools.name: get_schema
tools.description: Get the complete database schema for inventory management tables including inventory, suppliers, and transactions tables with column types and relationships.

tools.name: get_sql_templates
tools.description: Get pre-built SQL templates for common inventory queries. Available templates: low_stock, inventory_value, supplier_performance, transaction_summary.

template_name.description: Name of the SQL template to retrieve

tools.name: analyze_csv
tools.description: Analyze uploaded CSV file content to suggest database schema and sample queries. Detects column types and provides query suggestions.

resources.name: Inventory Schema
resources.description: Complete database schema for manufacturing inventory management including tables, columns, types, and relationships

resources.name: SQL Templates
resources.description: Pre-built SQL query templates for common inventory operations

prompts.name: inventory_query
prompts.description: Template prompt for inventory-related natural language queries

arguments.name: question
arguments.description: The inventory question to convert to SQL

prompts.name: supplier_analysis
prompts.description: Template prompt for supplier performance analysis queries

arguments.name: metric
arguments.description: The supplier metric to analyze (quality, delivery, lead_time)

server_info.rate_limits: Subject to Hugging Face Space limits
